thread.title: Farmers suicide cases: SC asks Modi government to file detailed reply and road map of action within 4 weeks
thread.title_full: Farmers suicide cases: SC asks Modi government to file detailed reply and road map of action within 4 weeks

author: FE Online
title: Farmers suicide cases: SC asks Modi government to file detailed reply and road map of action within 4 weeks
text:
India news Farmers suicide cases: SC asks Modi government to file detailed reply and road map of action within 4 weeks Farmers suicide cases: SC asks Modi government to file detailed reply and road map of action within 4 weeks Supreme Court has asked Modi government to come up with a concrete roadmap of action within 4 weeks to eliminate the reasons behind the farmer's suicide By: FE Online | Published: March 27, 2017 12:12 PM 
Supreme Court has asked Modi government to come up with a concrete roadmap of action within 4 weeks to eliminate the reasons behind the farmers suicide 
While expressing concern over the suicide of farmers due to poverty as a resultant of the crop failure, Supreme Court has asked Modi government to file a detailed reply and to come up with a concrete roadmap of action within 4 weeks.
